text.en: This site will be useful for financiers, financial analysts, traders, economists, and anyone interested in market cycles. I create financial statistical websites and dashboards. I work with charts, perform analysis, provide forecasts, and give recommendations. (The site is currently under development)
text.si: Ta spletna stran bo koristna za financerje, finanƒçne analitike, trgovce, ekonomiste in vse, ki jih zanimajo tr≈æni cikli. Ustvarjam finanƒçne statistiƒçne spletne strani in nadzorne plo≈°ƒçe (dashboards). Delam z grafi, izvajam analize, pripravljam napovedi in podajam priporoƒçila. (Spletna stran je trenutno v razvoju)

extra.en: Commentary

text.en:
Global M2 represents the total M2 money supply in the global economy ‚Äî a broad measure of liquidity that includes:
‚úî cash in circulation
‚úî demand deposits
‚úî savings deposits
‚úî other highly liquid financial instruments

These aggregates measure how much money is available in the economy for spending, investment, and lending.

üîπ Important: Global M2 is a macroeconomic indicator, not an on-chain blockchain metric. It is based on reports from major central banks (USA, Eurozone, China, Japan, etc.) and reflects global fiat currency liquidity.

How Global M2 affects the market and Bitcoin price

Relationship between Global M2 and BTC:
‚úî Numerous studies and charts show that growth in global money supply often coincides with rising Bitcoin prices ‚Äî although the relationship is not always direct or immediate.
‚úî Many analysts have observed that periods of M2 expansion historically aligned with BTC bull phases.
‚úî Global liquidity tends to impact risk assets (stocks, crypto) more strongly than conservative assets.
‚úî Some analysts suggest a time lag (~12 weeks) between Global M2 growth and BTC price movements.
‚úî Certain analytical models have found a statistical relationship between money supply growth and BTC (e.g., during 2015‚Äì2025).

Why Global M2 matters:
üá∫üá∏ Global M2 reflects cash and deposits that can potentially flow into financial markets.
When Global M2 increases ‚Üí available liquidity rises, part of which may:
‚úî flow into risk assets
‚úî support demand for BTC as an alternative asset
‚úî increase pressure on fiat currencies through inflation (theoretically)

This is why analysts closely monitor Global M2 as a macro indicator of liquidity and risk appetite.
text.si:
Globalni M2 predstavlja skupno denarno maso M2 v svetovnem gospodarstvu ‚Äî ≈°irok kazalnik likvidnosti, ki vkljuƒçuje:
‚úî gotovino v obtoku
‚úî depozite na vpogled
‚úî varƒçevalne vloge
‚úî druga visoko likvidna sredstva

Ti agregati merijo, koliko denarja je na voljo v gospodarstvu za potro≈°njo, nalo≈æbe in kreditiranje.

üîπ Pomembno: Globalni M2 je makroekonomski kazalnik, ne on-chain metrika verige blokov. Temelji na poroƒçilih centralnih bank veƒçjih dr≈æav (ZDA, evroobmoƒçje, Kitajska, Japonska itd.) in odra≈æa globalno likvidnost fiat valut.

Kako Globalni M2 vpliva na trg in ceno Bitcoina

Povezava med Globalnim M2 in BTC:
‚úî ≈†tevilne ≈°tudije in grafi ka≈æejo, da rast globalne denarne mase pogosto sovpada z rastjo cene Bitcoina ‚Äî ƒçeprav povezava ni vedno neposredna ali takoj≈°nja.
‚úî Analitiki opa≈æajo, da so se obdobja ≈°irjenja M2 zgodovinsko ujemala z bikovskimi fazami BTC.
‚úî Globalna likvidnost pogosto bolj vpliva na tvegana sredstva (delnice, kripto) kot na konzervativne nalo≈æbe.
‚úî Obstajajo predpostavke o ƒçasovnem zamiku (~12 tednov) med rastjo Globalnega M2 in gibanjem cene BTC.
‚úî Nekateri analitiƒçni modeli so odkrili statistiƒçno povezavo med rastjo denarne mase in BTC (npr. v obdobju 2015‚Äì2025).

Zakaj je Globalni M2 pomemben:
üá∫üá∏ Globalni M2 predstavlja gotovino in depozite, ki se lahko potencialno prelijejo na finanƒçne trge.
ƒåe Globalni M2 raste ‚Üí razpolo≈æljiva likvidnost se poveƒçuje, del te pa lahko:
‚úî preide v tvegana sredstva
‚úî podpira povpra≈°evanje po BTC kot alternativnem sredstvu
‚úî poveƒça pritisk na fiat valute prek inflacije (teoretiƒçno)

Zato analitiki spremljajo Globalni M2 kot makroekonomski kazalnik likvidnosti in nagnjenosti k tveganju.

extra.en:
ANALYSIS as of 02.01.2026.

Global M2 money supply continues to expand, though growth rates remain moderate.
M2 growth has been observed in the United States, the Eurozone, and other major economies.

Despite rising M2, Bitcoin price movements have at times diverged from a direct correlation (for example, during summer 2025, a divergence between BTC and Global M2 was observed).

This suggests that while global liquidity remains high, its impact on BTC price is indirect ‚Äî transmitted through demand, investor sentiment, and capital flows.

Global M2 impact outlook:

Short-term (1‚Äì4 weeks): moderate and indirect influence ‚Äî Global M2 should not be viewed as a short-term price trigger.

Medium-term (1‚Äì6 months): continued monetary expansion may support BTC through increased risk appetite and capital availability.

Long-term (12+ months): Global M2 remains a key macro factor ‚Äî rising liquidity supports capital-intensive assets such as Bitcoin.
extra.si:
ANALIZA na dan 02.01.2026.

Globalna denarna masa M2 se ≈°e naprej poveƒçuje, vendar z zmernimi stopnjami rasti.
Rast M2 je bila zaznana v ZDA, evroobmoƒçju in drugih veƒçjih gospodarstvih.

Kljub rasti M2 je gibanje cene Bitcoina obƒçasno odstopalo od neposredne korelacije (na primer poleti 2025 je bila opa≈æena divergenca med BTC in Globalnim M2).

To pomeni, da globalna likvidnost ostaja visoka, vendar njen vpliv na ceno BTC poteka posredno ‚Äî prek povpra≈°evanja, razpolo≈æenja vlagateljev in kapitalskih tokov.

Napoved vpliva Globalnega M2 na Bitcoin:

Kratkoroƒçno (1‚Äì4 tedne): zmeren in posreden vpliv ‚Äî Globalni M2 ni kratkoroƒçni spro≈æilec cene.

Srednjeroƒçno (1‚Äì6 mesecev): nadaljnja denarna ekspanzija lahko ustvari ugodno okolje za BTC zaradi veƒçje nagnjenosti k tveganju in razpolo≈æljivosti kapitala.

Dolgoroƒçno (12+ mesecev): Globalni M2 ostaja pomemben makro dejavnik ‚Äî rast likvidnosti podpira kapitalsko intenzivna sredstva, vkljuƒçno z Bitcoinom.

text.en: TREAST is a FRED indicator representing the amount of U.S. Treasury securities held on the Federal Reserve‚Äôs balance sheet. It serves as a key indicator of monetary policy stance and global dollar liquidity.

extra.en: Stability or growth in TREAST generally supports risk assets, while a decline signals tightening financial conditions.

text.en: WALCL reflects the total assets of the Federal Reserve. Balance sheet expansion indicates quantitative easing, while contraction signals quantitative tightening.

extra.en: The correlation between WALCL and Bitcoin has historically been strong, particularly during liquidity expansion phases.

text.en: USINTR represents the effective U.S. federal funds rate, the Federal Reserve‚Äôs primary monetary policy tool.

extra.en: Rate cuts increase liquidity and support Bitcoin, while pauses or tightening tend to apply downward pressure.

text.en: TGA reflects the U.S. Treasury‚Äôs cash balance at the Federal Reserve and directly impacts short-term market liquidity.

extra.en: A declining TGA injects liquidity into markets and supports Bitcoin.

text.en: RMP is a Federal Reserve program involving Treasury purchases aimed at stabilizing bank reserves after QT.

extra.en: RMP increases system liquidity without initiating full-scale QE.

text.en: RWA refers to the tokenization of real-world assets, bridging traditional finance and blockchain infrastructure.

extra.en: Growth of the RWA sector attracts institutional capital and strengthens macro support for the crypto market.

text.en:
Outlook for 2026‚Äì2027

Short-term (Q1‚ÄìQ2 2026): Probability of a new recession is estimated at 35‚Äì50% (Goldman Sachs/Fed models, risks from Trump-era tariffs adding +0.5‚Äì1% inflation). NBER could declare a cycle peak in Q1 2026 if unemployment exceeds 4.5‚Äì4.7% and GDP growth falls below 1.7%.

Medium-term: If a recession occurs, it is expected to be mild (2‚Äì3 quarters, ‚àí1‚Äì2% GDP), with NBER dating in H2 2026‚ÄìQ1 2027. The expansion could extend to 72‚Äì80 months if the Fed continues rate cuts (around 65% probability in January).

Long-term: Stabilization in 2027 with a potential new expansion and unemployment around 4%. Key risk: tariffs, which could raise unemployment by approximately +1 percentage point.

Market impact

Unemployment charts and NBER dating are lagging indicators, but expectations around them drive volatility. Expansion = bullish regime: equities +10‚Äì20% annually (S&P 500 ~6800 in a stable scenario), low VIX (~18), bond gains via falling yields. Recession = bearish regime: equities ‚àí20‚Äì50%, VIX +50‚Äì100%, rotation into defensives (bonds +5‚Äì10%, USD +5%). Current low unemployment implies stability, but a rise above 4.5% increases volatility by 8‚Äì10%.

Impact on Bitcoin price

BTC shows ~0.7 correlation with equities. Expansion supports BTC upside (+120% in 2025, BTC ~$88K). Recession implies a ‚àí40‚Äì60% correction ($60K‚Äì$70K, similar to 2022). Forecast: recession risk in 2026 ‚Üí BTC $60K‚Äì$70K; continued expansion ‚Üí $100K+ supported by liquidity and ETF flows.
text.si:
Napoved za obdobje 2026‚Äì2027

Kratkoroƒçno (Q1‚ÄìQ2 2026): Verjetnost nove recesije je ocenjena na 35‚Äì50 % (modeli Goldman Sachs/Fed, tveganja zaradi Trumpovih carin +0,5‚Äì1 % inflacije). NBER bi lahko razglasil vrh cikla v Q1 2026, ƒçe brezposelnost prese≈æe 4,5‚Äì4,7 % in rast BDP pade pod 1,7 %.

Srednjeroƒçno: V primeru recesije se priƒçakuje blag scenarij (2‚Äì3 ƒçetrtletja, ‚àí1‚Äì2 % BDP), z datiranjem NBER v drugi polovici 2026 ali v Q1 2027. Ekspanzija se lahko podalj≈°a na 72‚Äì80 mesecev, ƒçe Fed nadaljuje z zni≈æevanjem obrestnih mer (verjetnost pribli≈æno 65 % v januarju).

Dolgoroƒçno: Stabilizacija v letu 2027 in morebitna nova ekspanzija z brezposelnostjo okoli 4 %. Glavno tveganje predstavljajo carine, ki bi lahko poveƒçale brezposelnost za pribli≈æno +1 odstotno toƒçko.

Vpliv na trge

Grafi brezposelnosti in datiranje NBER so zaostajajoƒçi kazalniki, vendar njihova priƒçakovanja poveƒçujejo volatilnost. Ekspanzija = bikovski trg: delnice +10‚Äì20 % letno (S&P 500 ~6800 v stabilnem scenariju), nizek VIX (~18), rast obveznic zaradi padca donosnosti. Recesija = medvedji trg: delnice ‚àí20‚Äì50 %, VIX +50‚Äì100 %, prehod v obrambne nalo≈æbe (obveznice +5‚Äì10 %, USD +5 %). Trenutno nizka brezposelnost pomeni stabilnost, vendar rast nad 4,5 % poveƒça volatilnost za 8‚Äì10 %.

Vpliv na ceno Bitcoina

BTC ima pribli≈æno 0,7 korelacijo z delni≈°kimi trgi. Ekspanzija podpira rast BTC (+120 % v letu 2025, cena ~$88K). Recesija pomeni popravek ‚àí40‚Äì60 % (razpon $60K‚Äì$70K, podobno kot leta 2022). Napoved: tveganje recesije v 2026 ‚Üí BTC $60K‚Äì$70K; nadaljevanje ekspanzije ‚Üí $100K+ ob podpori likvidnosti in ETF tokov.

extra.en: NBER Business Cycle Dating identifies the start and end of recessions and expansions in the U.S. economy. Historically, unemployment rises sharply during recessions and falls during expansions. The current level (~4.3% in Nov 2025, BLS) remains low. The increase from 3.8% in 2023 to 4.3% in 2025 is a warning signal but far below recessionary peaks (e.g., 14.8% in 2020). The expansion has continued since May 2020 (~68 months), with no new recession declared by NBER. Rising unemployment is a yellow flag, not yet critical.
extra.si: Datiranje poslovnih ciklov NBER doloƒça zaƒçetke in konce recesij ter ekspanzij v gospodarstvu ZDA. Zgodovinsko brezposelnost med recesijami moƒçno naraste, med ekspanzijami pa upada. Trenutna raven (~4,3 % v novembru 2025, BLS) ostaja nizka. Poveƒçanje z 3,8 % v letu 2023 na 4,3 % v letu 2025 je opozorilni signal, vendar precej pod recesijskimi vrhovi (npr. 14,8 % v letu 2020). Ekspanzija traja od maja 2020 (~68 mesecev), NBER ≈°e ni razglasil nove recesije. Rast brezposelnosti je "rumena zastava", ne pa kritiƒçni signal.

text.en:
NBER-based recession indicators rely on the official business cycle dating methodology of the National Bureau of Economic Research. The NBER committee evaluates a broad set of economic indicators including GDP, employment, income, industrial production, and sales, rather than relying solely on the simplified rule of two consecutive quarters of negative GDP growth.

Recession dates are announced retroactively with a delay of 6‚Äì18 months to ensure accuracy. As of late 2025, the U.S. economy remains in expansion, with no official recession declared by NBER.

extra.en: Analysis as of December 25, 2025. The current expansion has continued since May 2020, reaching approximately 68 months. Unemployment has risen modestly but remains far below historical recessionary levels, suggesting a soft landing scenario rather than an imminent downturn.

text.en:
The GDP-Based Recession Indicator Index is a quarterly measure estimating the probability that the U.S. economy was in recession during a given quarter. Values above 67% indicate a high probability of recession, while values below 33% suggest that a recession is unlikely or has ended.

The indicator is retrospective in nature and does not forecast future recessions. It is never revised once published.

extra.en: Based on Q3 2025 data, the indicator remains near historical lows, supported by strong real GDP growth of approximately 4.3%. Preliminary expectations for Q4 2025 also suggest low recession probability. Overall, the trend confirms continued economic expansion with growing, but still manageable, downside risks.

title.ru: Security Brokers and Dealers; Debt Securities; Asset, Level
title.en: Security Brokers and Dealers: Debt Securities Assets

text.ru: –ê–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑ –∏–Ω–¥–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–∞ SBDDSA (Security Brokers and Dealers; Debt Securities; Asset, Level) –Ω–∞ 28.12.2025...
text.en:
Analysis of the SBDDSA indicator (Security Brokers and Dealers: Debt Securities; Asset Level) as of December 28, 2025.

SBDDSA reflects the volume of debt securities held as assets by U.S. security brokers and dealers. This indicator provides insight into the balance sheet structure of the broker-dealer sector and their exposure to fixed-income instruments such as government and corporate bonds.

As of Q2 2025, the indicator reached approximately USD 1.28 trillion, continuing a multi-quarter upward trend. This sustained growth suggests increased participation of financial intermediaries in debt markets, potentially driven by interest rate expectations, portfolio rebalancing, or defensive positioning amid late-cycle economic conditions.

extra.en: Medium-term analysis indicates that rising SBDDSA levels may reflect a cautious market stance. Accumulation of debt securities often coincides with lower volatility, reduced risk appetite, and a preference for yield stability. For financial markets, this can imply moderate equity performance, stable bond demand, and a consolidation phase for risk assets, including cryptocurrencies.

text.en:
The Sahm Rule Recession Indicator is an early-warning economic signal developed by economist Claudia Sahm. It identifies the onset of a recession when the three-month moving average of the unemployment rate rises by at least 0.50 percentage points above its lowest level over the previous 12 months.

As of November 2025, the Sahm Rule value is estimated between 0.23 and 0.43 percentage points, remaining below the recession threshold. Although unemployment is rising, the indicator does not yet confirm that a recession has begun.

extra.en: The upward trend in the Sahm Rule suggests growing labor market softening, but not a full recession signal. If the indicator surpasses the 0.50 threshold, it would imply that a recession is already underway. Until then, the signal remains neutral-to-cautious, implying moderate volatility in equities and a conditional risk environment for Bitcoin and other risk assets.

text.en:
As of December 26, 2025, the T10Y2Y spread stands at approximately +0.68 percentage points, remaining firmly in positive territory. This indicates that 10-year Treasury yields exceed 2-year yields, reflecting a normally shaped yield curve.

The spread has widened compared to the previous year (~0.28%), signaling partial normalization after the deep inversions observed during 2022‚Äì2024. However, it remains slightly below the long-term historical average, suggesting that while recession fears have eased, growth expectations remain moderate.

extra.en:
The T10Y2Y spread represents the difference between 10-year and 2-year U.S. Treasury yields and is a widely used macroeconomic indicator of business cycle expectations. A positive spread typically signals economic stability, while a flattening or inversion may precede economic downturns.

At current levels, the curve suggests moderate confidence in economic continuity, supporting risk assets while keeping investors alert to potential slowdowns.

text.en:
As of December 17, 2025, the WTREGEN indicator stands at approximately USD 833 billion. This reflects the balance of U.S. Treasury deposits held at the Federal Reserve, excluding bank reserve balances.

A high WTREGEN level indicates that a significant portion of government liquidity is retained within the Treasury General Account rather than circulating through the banking system. This can temporarily reduce available market liquidity and influence financial conditions.

extra.en:
WTREGEN is closely monitored as part of broader liquidity models. Elevated balances suggest restrained fiscal liquidity injection, which may dampen risk appetite across financial markets.

In a medium-term context, persistently high WTREGEN levels may contribute to equity consolidation, lower volatility in bond markets, and subdued momentum in Bitcoin and other liquidity-sensitive assets unless offset by central bank easing or fiscal outflows.

text.en:
The T10Y3M spread measures the difference between 10-year and 3-month U.S. Treasury yields and is considered one of the most reliable leading indicators of economic cycles.

As of late December 2025, the spread remains positive at approximately +0.50%, indicating a non-inverted yield curve. This suggests that markets do not currently anticipate an imminent recession, although the spread remains below its long-term historical average, pointing to late-cycle economic conditions rather than strong expansion.

extra.en:
Historically, sustained inversions of the T10Y3M spread have preceded U.S. recessions by 6‚Äì18 months. The current positive but narrow spread reflects cautious optimism: investors expect economic growth to continue, but at a moderate pace.

For risk assets, a positive T10Y3M spread is generally supportive. However, a decline toward zero would increase recession risk signals and raise volatility across equities and crypto markets, including Bitcoin.

text.en:
The Kansas City Financial Stress Index (KCFSI) is a composite indicator developed by the Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City to measure stress in U.S. financial markets. It is based on 11 market variables, including interest rates, yield spreads, and volatility measures.

As of November 2025, the KCFSI stands near ‚Äì0.75, well below zero, indicating that financial stress remains lower than its historical average and that overall financial conditions are relatively calm.

extra.en:
A persistently negative KCFSI suggests stable credit conditions, adequate liquidity, and limited systemic stress. In such environments, risk assets such as equities and cryptocurrencies tend to perform more favorably, assuming no external shocks occur.

If the index were to rise toward or above zero, it would signal tightening financial conditions, increased volatility, and a potential shift toward defensive positioning across markets.

recession.image: assets/RC KCFSI ‚Äî Kansas City Financial Stress Index.png

title.ru: ICE BofA US High Yield Index
title.en: ICE BofA US High Yield Index

text.en:
ICE BofA US High Yield Index. Analysis as of 24.12.2025. Value ‚âà 6.53 % ‚Äî effective yield of US high-yield corporate bonds. This means investors on average earn around 6.5% annually, reflecting current risk assessments and market conditions.

Context:
‚Äî Below historical average (~7.8‚Äì8 %)
‚Äî Below crisis levels (>10‚Äì15 %)
This indicates credit markets are in a moderate state, not extreme.

Medium-term forecast (6‚Äì12 months):
1) If yields decline: investor sentiment improves, risk appetite rises, risk assets supported
2) If yields rise: credit concerns increase, financial conditions tighten

Market impact:
Equities: rising yields ‚Üí pressure on risky stocks; falling yields ‚Üí support for risk appetite
Credit markets: rising yields ‚Üí tighter conditions; falling yields ‚Üí comfortable lending environment

Impact on Bitcoin (BTC):
Falling/stable yields ‚Üí support for risk appetite ‚Üí BTC may rise
Rising yields ‚Üí warning signal ‚Üí BTC may correct more sharply

extra.en: BAMLH0A0HYM2EY ‚Äî data series code representing the effective yield of US high-yield corporate bonds (junk bonds, BB rating and below). The index reflects investor compensation for credit risk: higher yields indicate higher perceived default risk.

recession.image: assets/RC ICE BofA US High Yield Index.png

text.en:
Analysis as of 24.12.2025. Buffett Indicator ‚âà 220‚Äì226 % ‚Äî market capitalization is twice the size of the US economy. Historically record-high values, well above the average (~158 %). This signals a strong market overvaluation.

Medium-term forecast (6‚Äì12 months):
1) Bearish scenario: economic slowdown ‚Üí stock corrections
2) Sideways/stagnation: high valuations without growth drivers ‚Üí market consolidation
3) Continued growth, but moderate: corporate profits outpace GDP, risky position

Impact on markets and BTC:
Equities: higher chance of corrections
Bonds: investors may shift to safe assets
BTC/crypto: indirectly via risk appetite, rises during risk-on, falls during risk-off

Trading use:
Very high levels (>200 %) ‚Üí caution; low levels (<100 %) ‚Üí potentially favorable

extra.en: Buffett Indicator = Market Cap / GDP √ó 100 %. Shows how expensive the US stock market is relative to the economy, Warren Buffett‚Äôs favorite metric for overall market valuation.

text.en:
Analysis as of 24.12.2025. Buffett Indicator ‚âà 220‚Äì226 % ‚Äî market capitalization is twice the size of the US economy. Historically record-high values, well above the average (~158 %). This signals a strong market overvaluation.

Medium-term forecast (6‚Äì12 months):
1) Bearish scenario: economic slowdown ‚Üí stock corrections
2) Sideways/stagnation: high valuations without growth drivers ‚Üí market consolidation
3) Continued growth, but moderate: corporate profits outpace GDP, risky position

Impact on markets and BTC:
Equities: higher chance of corrections
Bonds: investors may shift to safe assets
BTC/crypto: indirectly via risk appetite, rises during risk-on, falls during risk-off

Very high levels (>200 %) ‚Üí caution; low levels (<100 %) ‚Üí potentially favorable

extra.en: Buffett Indicator = Market Cap / GDP √ó 100 %. Shows how expensive the US stock market is relative to the economy, Warren Buffett‚Äôs favorite metric for overall market valuation.

text.en:
Analysis as of December 2025. Value ~1,877‚Äì2,294 points after decline from early December (~2,845). Annual growth ‚âà 80‚Äì88 %. Index above recent lows, but below historical peaks (~11,793 in 2008).

Medium-term forecast (6‚Äì12 months):
‚Äî If global economy grows ‚Üí index stabilizes or rises slightly
‚Äî If commodity demand weakens ‚Üí possible correction or consolidation

Market impact:
Equities/commodities: rising BDI ‚Üí supports industrial and commodity sectors
Falling ‚Üí signals slowing demand, pressure on cyclical stocks
BTC/crypto: indirectly via risk appetite ‚Äî rising BDI ‚Üí risk-on, falling ‚Üí risk-off

extra.en: BDI measures the cost of shipping dry bulk commodities (coal, ore, grain) on major routes. Rising index ‚Üí stronger global trade; falling ‚Üí weaker activity.

text.en:
Analysis as of December 2025. Value ~1,877‚Äì2,294 points after decline from early December (~2,845). Annual growth ‚âà 80‚Äì88 %. Index above recent lows, but below historical peaks (~11,793 in 2008).

Medium-term forecast (6‚Äì12 months):
‚Äî If global economy grows ‚Üí index stabilizes or rises slightly
‚Äî If commodity demand weakens ‚Üí possible correction or consolidation

Market impact:
Equities/commodities: rising BDI ‚Üí supports industrial and commodity sectors
Falling ‚Üí signals slowing demand, pressure on cyclical stocks
BTC/crypto: indirectly via risk appetite ‚Äî rising BDI ‚Üí risk-on, falling ‚Üí risk-off

extra.en: BDI measures the cost of shipping dry bulk commodities (coal, ore, grain) on major routes. Rising index ‚Üí stronger global trade; falling ‚Üí weaker activity.

text.en:
Analysis as of December 2025. Inflation (CPI YoY) ‚âà 2.7 % ‚Äî lower than previous months and near the Fed‚Äôs target (~2 %).

Medium-term forecast (6‚Äì12 months):
‚Äî Inflation likely remains moderate (2‚Äì3 %)
‚Äî Low inflation ‚Üí Fed may slow rate hikes ‚Üí supports risk assets
‚Äî Rising inflation ‚Üí potential tightening ‚Üí pressure on equities and BTC

Market impact:
Equities: moderate inflation ‚Üí positive, rising ‚Üí negative
Bonds: falling inflation ‚Üí yields drop, rising ‚Üí yields rise
Dollar: low inflation ‚Üí weaker, rising ‚Üí stronger
BTC/crypto: low inflation and easy policy ‚Üí upward; rising inflation ‚Üí possible correction

extra.en: USIRYY shows the annual change in US consumer prices (CPI). Key indicator of inflation pressure and Fed monetary policy.

recession.image: assets/RC Consumer Price Index ‚Äî CPI YoY ( USIRYY).png

text.en:
Analysis of Bitcoin open interest, price, and volume (as of December 23, 2025). BTC shows mixed dynamics: price in a sideways range after bouncing from $85K, average volume, high open interest, signaling potential volatility.

Key metrics:
- Price: ~$88,088‚Äì$88,870 USD, +2.29% over 24h, rejected at $90K.
- Volume: 24h ~$29.77B, CME futures 2,657 contracts ‚Äî average.
- Open Interest: futures ~$60B, options OI ~$23.6B for expiry Dec 26.

Analysis: rising OI + sideways price = prep for breakout (bullish if volume rises, bearish if fakeout). High options OI = volatility around expiry.
Short-term (1‚Äì7 days): $90K‚Äì$92K (60% chance if volume >$30B), pullback to $85K (40%).
Medium-term (1‚Äì3 months): growth to $100K+ with liquidity support and ETF inflows, correction risk ‚Äì10‚Äì20%.
Long-term (2026): $100K‚Äì$120K, recession 35‚Äì50% ‚Üí drop to $60K‚Äì$70K.

extra.en: Commentary: Metrics indicate consolidation with a bullish bias. Correlation with S&P 500 ~0.75.

text.en:
Analysis of Bitcoin open interest, price, and volume (as of December 23, 2025). BTC shows mixed dynamics: price in a sideways range after bouncing from $85K, average volume, high open interest, signaling potential volatility.

Key metrics:
- Price: ~$88,088‚Äì$88,870 USD, +2.29% over 24h, rejected at $90K.
- Volume: 24h ~$29.77B, CME futures 2,657 contracts ‚Äî average.
- Open Interest: futures ~$60B, options OI ~$23.6B for expiry Dec 26.

Analysis: rising OI + sideways price = prep for breakout (bullish if volume rises, bearish if fakeout). High options OI = volatility around expiry.
Short-term (1‚Äì7 days): $90K‚Äì$92K (60% chance if volume >$30B), pullback to $85K (40%).
Medium-term (1‚Äì3 months): growth to $100K+ with liquidity support and ETF inflows, correction risk ‚Äì10‚Äì20%.
Long-term (2026): $100K‚Äì$120K, recession 35‚Äì50% ‚Üí drop to $60K‚Äì$70K.

extra.en: Commentary: Metrics indicate consolidation with a bullish bias. Correlation with S&P 500 ~0.75.

text.en:
Funding rate ‚Äî a mechanism on perpetual futures to maintain parity with spot. Positive rate: longs pay shorts, bullish market. Negative: shorts pay longs, bearish market.

As of Dec 31, 2025: moderately positive rates (~0.007‚Äì0.015% per calculation period) ‚Äî indicate long positions dominance without extreme overheating.

Short-term: supports moderately bullish BTC trend with stable volume and liquidity.
Medium-term: positive rates + rising OI ‚Üí fuel growth or hold range above key levels; sharp rate spikes ‚Üí correction risk.
Long-term: reflect derivative traders‚Äô sentiment, confirm market phase, but not a fundamental BTC driver.

extra.en: Funding rates show the imbalance between longs and shorts on BTC futures and reflect trader sentiment.

text.en:
Bitcoin Active Addresses is an on-chain metric measuring the number of unique Bitcoin addresses that were active (sent or received transactions) over a period (usually daily or 7-day MA). It indicates real network usage: high = growing activity, low = cooling interest.

As of Dec 2025:
‚Äî Current 7-day MA ~660,000 active addresses, daily values ~114,597‚Äì430,364
‚Äî Trend declining from peak >900,000 in 2024 (Ordinals/Runes hype)
‚Äî Context: BTC +120% ($40K ‚Üí $88K) but addresses low ‚Äî speculative growth, bearish divergence.

Forecast:
Short-term (1‚Äì4 weeks): <600K ‚Üí BTC correction ‚Äì5‚Äì10%, >800K ‚Üí breakout to $90K‚Äì$95K
Medium-term (1‚Äì3 months): low addresses + recession risks ‚Üí pressure to $70K‚Äì$80K, growth ‚Üí $100K+
Long-term (2026): return to 900K+ ‚Üí bull to $120K, continued decline ‚Üí stagnation ~$74K

extra.en: Commentary: Address activity correlates with BTC price (~0.6‚Äì0.7). Low values = bearish signal, growth = bullish.

text.en:
NVT Ratio (Network Value to Transactions) is an on-chain metric showing BTC market cap relative to transaction volume. RVT Ratio (Realized Value to Transactions) uses realized cap, more resilient to market speculation.

Principle:
‚Äî High NVT/RVT ‚Üí network underactive vs value ‚Üí possible overvaluation
‚Äî Low NVT/RVT ‚Üí active network ‚Üí price may be fair or undervalued

Analysis as of Dec 31, 2025:
‚Äî NVT moderate ~85‚Äì90, not extreme ‚Üí price not obviously overbought
‚Äî RVT stable, reflecting fundamental demand and correction completion

Impact forecast:
Short-term (1‚Äì3 months): growing transactions ‚Üí lower NVT/RVT ‚Üí supports BTC
Medium-term (3‚Äì12 months): declining NVT/RVT with higher activity ‚Üí bullish signal; rising ratios during stagnation ‚Üí potential consolidation
Long-term: downward NVT/RVT trend ‚Üí sustained price growth with active network; NVT/RVT peaks ‚Üí potential corrections

extra.en: Commentary: NVT and RVT assess network health and fundamental demand for Bitcoin, serving as P/E analogs for crypto.

text.en:
MVRV Ratio shows how much BTC market cap exceeds realized cap (Realized Cap).
‚Äî MVRV = Market Cap / Realized Cap

Interpretation:
‚Äî MVRV > 1 ‚Üí most holders in profit, possible overvaluation
‚Äî MVRV ‚âà 1 ‚Üí price near fundamental network value
‚Äî MVRV < 1 ‚Üí most holders at loss, potential bottom/capitulation zone

Analysis as of Dec 31, 2025:
‚Äî MVRV ~1.8‚Äì2.0 after correction, below past cycle peaks (>3.5)
‚Äî Early 2025 BTC was in neutral zone, balance between profitable holders and accumulation

Impact forecast:
Short-term: MVRV neutral ‚Üí supports price movement without extreme overbought levels
Medium-term: MVRV rising with BTC ‚Üí market strengthening; MVRV >3 ‚Üí historical overbought signal
Long-term: extreme MVRV ‚Üí cycle peaks/corrections; moderate MVRV ‚Üí sustainable fundamental growth

extra.en: Commentary: MVRV reflects holders‚Äô unrealized profit/loss and helps assess overbought conditions or accumulation zones in BTC.

text.en:
NUPL shows net unrealized profit or loss of BTC holders:
‚Äî NUPL = (Market Cap ‚àí Realized Cap) / Market Cap

Interpretation:
‚Äî High positive (>0.75) ‚Üí most holders in profit, potential market overheating
‚Äî Moderate positive (0.3‚Äì0.6) ‚Üí holders in profit, stable growth
‚Äî Near zero or negative ‚Üí many holders at loss, possible capitulation/bottom zone

Analysis as of Jan 1, 2025:
‚Äî NUPL moderately positive (~0.3‚Äì0.6), majority in profit, not at euphoric extremes
‚Äî Signals accumulation phase or moderate trend, not peak

Impact forecast:
Short-term: moderate values ‚Üí stable trend, no strong profit-taking pressure
Medium-term: rising NUPL ‚Üí supports ongoing trend; decline ‚Üí possible corrections
Long-term: extreme values ‚Üí cycle peaks/bottoms, moderate ‚Üí balanced market

extra.en: Commentary: NUPL reflects market sentiment and holders‚Äô readiness to take profits or hold losses.

text.en:
SOPR shows whether BTC holders sell at profit or loss:
‚Äî SOPR = selling price / purchase price

Interpretation:
‚Äî SOPR > 1 ‚Üí holders sell at profit on average
‚Äî SOPR ‚âà 1 ‚Üí break-even sales
‚Äî SOPR < 1 ‚Üí holders sell at loss

Analysis as of Jan 1, 2025:
‚Äî SOPR > 1, significant portion of sold coins realized profit
‚Äî Corresponds to recovery/accumulation phase after prior corrections

Impact forecast:
Short-term: SOPR > 1 ‚Üí moderate rise or sideways consolidation, no panic
Medium-term: stably above 1 ‚Üí gradual accumulation, decreasing profit-taking
Long-term: SOPR > 1 without spikes ‚Üí trend continuation, indicates market stages (accumulation ‚Üí distribution)

extra.en: Commentary: SOPR reflects real holder behavior, showing profit or loss realization.

text.ru:
Realized Price ‚Äî —Å—Ä–µ–¥–Ω—è—è —Ü–µ–Ω–∞, –ø–æ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–π –≤—Å–µ —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–∏–µ BTC –±—ã–ª–∏ –≤ –ø–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–Ω–∏–π —Ä–∞–∑ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–º–µ—â–µ–Ω—ã –Ω–∞ –±–ª–æ–∫—á–µ–π–Ω–µ.

–§–æ—Ä–º—É–ª–∞:
Realized Price = Realized Market Cap / Circulating Supply

–ò–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–ø—Ä–µ—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—è:
‚Äî –¶–µ–Ω–∞ > Realized Price ‚Üí –±–æ–ª—å—à–∏–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–æ –¥–µ—Ä–∂–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π –≤ –ø—Ä–∏–±—ã–ª–∏, –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ —Ü–µ–Ω—ã, –º–µ–Ω—å—à–µ –ø–∞–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö —Ä–∞—Å–ø—Ä–æ–¥–∞–∂
‚Äî –¶–µ–Ω–∞ ‚âà Realized Price ‚Üí –±–∞–ª–∞–Ω—Å –≤—Ö–æ–¥–æ–≤ –∏ –≤—ã—Ö–æ–¥–æ–≤, –ø–æ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –∑–æ–Ω–∞ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∏
‚Äî –¶–µ–Ω–∞ < Realized Price ‚Üí –¥–µ—Ä–∂–∞—Ç–µ–ª–∏ –≤ —É–±—ã—Ç–∫–µ, —É—Å–∏–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ö–∞, –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω—ã–µ –∫–∞–ø–∏—Ç—É–ª—è—Ü–∏–∏

–ê–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑ –Ω–∞ 01.01.2025:
‚Äî –†–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–∞—è —Ü–µ–Ω–∞ –∑–Ω–∞—á–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ –Ω–∏–∂–µ —Ä—ã–Ω–æ—á–Ω–æ–π ‚Üí –±–æ–ª—å—à–∏–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–æ –¥–µ—Ä–∂–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π –≤ –ø—Ä–∏–±—ã–ª–∏
‚Äî –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ —Ñ—É–Ω–¥–∞–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–¥–∞ BTC

–ü—Ä–æ–≥–Ω–æ–∑ –≤–ª–∏—è–Ω–∏—è:
–ö—Ä–∞—Ç–∫–æ—Å—Ä–æ—á–Ω–æ: —Å–ª—É–∂–∏—Ç –∑–æ–Ω–æ–π –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∏, –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ü–∏–∏ –º–µ–Ω–µ–µ –≥–ª—É–±–æ–∫–∏–µ –ø—Ä–∏ —Ü–µ–Ω–µ –≤—ã—à–µ Realized Price
–°—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–µ—Å—Ä–æ—á–Ω–æ: –ø–æ—Å—Ç–µ–ø–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ä–æ—Å—Ç Realized Price –æ—Ç—Ä–∞–∂–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∞–∫–æ–ø–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –¥–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∏–µ —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤
–î–æ–ª–≥–æ—Å—Ä–æ—á–Ω–æ: —Ä–æ—Å—Ç –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ —Å —Ä—ã–Ω–∫–æ–º —É–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∞ —É–∫—Ä–µ–ø–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ñ—É–Ω–¥–∞–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ BTC –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–¥–æ–ª–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –±—ã—á—å–µ–≥–æ —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–¥–∞
text.en:
Realized Price ‚Äî the average price at which all existing BTC were last moved on-chain.

Formula:
Realized Price = Realized Market Cap / Circulating Supply

Interpretation:
‚Äî Price > Realized Price ‚Üí most holders in profit, price support, less panic selling
‚Äî Price ‚âà Realized Price ‚Üí balance of inflows/outflows, potential support zone
‚Äî Price < Realized Price ‚Üí holders at loss, increased fear, potential capitulation

Analysis as of Jan 1, 2025:
‚Äî Realized Price significantly below market price ‚Üí most holders in profit
‚Äî Supports BTC fundamental trend

Impact forecast:
Short-term: acts as support zone, shallower corrections if price above Realized Price
Medium-term: gradual growth of Realized Price reflects accumulation and participant confidence
Long-term: growth alongside market indicates strengthening BTC fundamentals and continuation of bullish trend

extra.en: Commentary: Realized Price helps assess fundamental support levels and holder psychology.

‚Äî –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ —Ñ—É–Ω–¥–∞–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ç—Ä–µ–Ω–¥–∞ BTC

text.en:
CDD measures BTC movement considering how long coins were dormant before a transaction.

As of 01.01.2026: 60-day moving CDD sharply increased to 6-year highs, indicating active movement of old coins.

Impact on price:
‚Äî High CDD ‚Üí long-term holders selling, potential short-term correction
‚Äî Low CDD ‚Üí holding coins, supporting stability and price growth
‚Äî Prolonged CDD rise ‚Üí higher volatility, possible reversals
‚Äî CDD drop after peaks ‚Üí trend stabilization

Forecast:
Short-term: price fluctuations due to movement of old coins
Medium-term: prolonged high CDD ‚Üí sideways/consolidation, drop ‚Üí bullish trend resumes
Long-term: low CDD ‚Üí accumulation, supporting stable BTC growth

extra.en: Commentary: CDD reflects long-term holder activity and can signal potential corrections or trend reversals.

text.ru:
–ê–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑ Hashrate –∏ Hashrate Ribbons –Ω–∞ —Å–µ–≥–æ–¥–Ω—è (25 –¥–µ–∫–∞–±—Ä—è 2025 –≥–æ–¥–∞)
Hashrate ‚Äî —ç—Ç–æ –æ–±—â–∞—è –≤—ã—á–∏—Å–ª–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –º–æ—â–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å —Å–µ—Ç–∏ –ë–∏—Ç–∫–æ–∏–Ω, –∏–∑–º–µ—Ä—è–µ–º–∞—è –≤ —ç–∫–∑–∞—Ö–µ—à–∞—Ö –≤ —Å–µ–∫—É–Ω–¥—É (EH/s). –≠—Ç–æ –∏–Ω–¥–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ—Ä –±–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–µ—Ç–∏ (–≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–∏–π hashrate = —Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–æ –∞—Ç–∞–∫–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å) –∏ —É–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –º–∞–π–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤ (—Ä–æ—Å—Ç = –æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–∏–±—ã–ª–∏ –æ—Ç –º–∞–π–Ω–∏–Ω–≥–∞). –ù–∞ —Å–µ–≥–æ–¥–Ω—è hashrate ~1,094‚Äì1,171 EH/s, —á—Ç–æ –Ω–∞ 4% –Ω–∏–∂–µ –ø–∏–∫–∞ –¥–µ–∫–∞–±—Ä—è (~1,239 EH/s –Ω–∞ 30 –Ω–æ—è–±—Ä—è). –°–Ω–∏–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤ –¥–µ–∫–∞–±—Ä–µ (‚Äì1% –º/–º) —É–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∞ –∫–∞–ø–∏—Ç—É–ª—è—Ü–∏—é –º–∞–π–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤ (miner capitulation) ‚Äî —Å–ª–∞–±—ã–µ –º–∞–π–Ω–µ—Ä—ã –≤—ã—Ö–æ–¥—è—Ç, –¥–æ—Ö–æ–¥–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–∞–¥–∞–µ—Ç (mining cost ~$101K/BTC, —Ü–µ–Ω–∞ $88K).
Hashrate Ribbons ‚Äî –∏–Ω–¥–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ—Ä: 30-–¥–Ω–µ–≤–Ω–∞—è –∏ 60-–¥–Ω–µ–≤–Ω–∞—è —Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∑—è—â–∏–µ —Å—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–∏–µ hashrate. Buy signal ‚Äî 30d MA –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å–µ–∫–∞–µ—Ç 60d MA —Å–Ω–∏–∑—É –≤–≤–µ—Ä—Ö. –ù–∞ —Å–µ–≥–æ–¥–Ω—è ribbons –≤ buy signal —Ñ–∞–∑–µ (5-–π —Ä–∞–∑ –≤ 2025), –Ω–æ —Å–∂–∞—Ç–∏–µ —É–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∞ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω—ã–π reversal.
–û–±—â–∏–π –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑: –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–∏–π hashrate = —Å–µ—Ç—å —Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–∞, —Å–Ω–∏–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ 4% = –∫–∞–ø–∏—Ç—É–ª—è—Ü–∏—è, Ribbons buy = –±—ã—á–∏–π –¥–∏–≤–µ—Ä–≥–µ–Ω—Å.
–°—Ä–µ–¥–Ω–µ—Å—Ä–æ—á–Ω—ã–π –ø—Ä–æ–≥–Ω–æ–∑ (1‚Äì3 –º–µ—Å—è—Ü–∞): hashrate —Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–µ—Ç—Å—è ~1,100 EH/s, ribbons –æ—Å—Ç–∞—é—Ç—Å—è bullish ‚Üí —Ä–æ—Å—Ç BTC $90K‚Äì$95K (60%). –†–∏—Å–∫ >10% —Å–Ω–∏–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è = –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–∫—Ü–∏—è $80K‚Äì$85K (40%). –í 2026 –æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è —Ä–æ—Å—Ç hashrate +20‚Äì30%, ribbons buy ‚Üí $100K+.
–í–ª–∏—è–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–∞ —Ä—ã–Ω–∫–∏: –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–∏–π hashrate = —Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ-—Å–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–∞, —Å–Ω–∏–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ = –≤–æ–ª–∞—Ç–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å. Ribbons buy = –±—É–ª–ª –¥–ª—è –∞–ª—å—Ç–∫–æ–∏–Ω–æ–≤.
–ù–∞ —Ç—Ä–µ–π–¥–∏–Ω–≥: crossover = buy signal, reversal = sell. –ö–æ–º–±–∏–Ω–∏—Ä—É–π—Ç–µ —Å NVT Ratio. –ù–∞ TradingView –∏–Ω–¥–∏–∫–∞—Ç–æ—Ä "Hashrate Ribbons" ‚Äî buy on blue/red crossover.
–ù–∞ —Ü–µ–Ω—É BTC: –∫–æ—Ä—Ä–µ–ª—è—Ü–∏—è ~0.6‚Äì0.7. –°–ø–∞–¥ hashrate = –º–µ–¥–≤–µ–¥—å (‚Äì1‚Äì5%), Ribbons buy = –±—É–ª–ª (+2‚Äì5%), –ø–æ—Ç–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∞–ª —Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞ –∫ $90K, –Ω–æ —Å–∂–∞—Ç–∏–µ = —Ä–∏—Å–∫ ‚Äì5‚Äì10% ($80K‚Äì$85K).
text.en:
Hashrate and Hashrate Ribbons analysis as of Dec 25, 2025.
Hashrate ‚Äî total computational power of the Bitcoin network, measured in exahashes per second (EH/s). It indicates network security (high hashrate = hard to attack) and miner confidence (growth = expected mining profits). Current hashrate ~1,094‚Äì1,171 EH/s, 4% below December peak (~1,239 EH/s on Nov 30). December decline (‚Äì1% MoM) signals miner capitulation ‚Äî weak miners exit, profitability drops (mining cost ~$101K/BTC, price $88K).
Hashrate Ribbons ‚Äî indicator using 30-day and 60-day moving averages. Buy signal occurs when 30d MA crosses 60d MA upwards. Currently in buy phase (5th in 2025), but compression indicates potential reversal.
Summary: high hashrate = stable network, 4% decline = capitulation, Ribbons buy = bullish divergence.
Medium-term forecast (1‚Äì3 months): hashrate stabilizes ~1,100 EH/s, ribbons remain bullish ‚Üí BTC $90K‚Äì$95K (60%). Risk of >10% drop = correction $80K‚Äì$85K (40%). In 2026, expected hashrate growth +20‚Äì30%, ribbons buy ‚Üí $100K+.
Market impact: high hashrate = crypto sector stability, decline = volatility. Ribbons buy = bullish for altcoins.
Trading: crossover = buy signal, reversal = sell. Combine with NVT Ratio. TradingView indicator "Hashrate Ribbons" ‚Äî buy on blue/red crossover.
BTC price: correlation ~0.6‚Äì0.7. Hashrate decline = bearish (‚Äì1‚Äì5%), Ribbons buy = bullish (+2‚Äì5%), growth potential to $90K, compression = risk ‚Äì5‚Äì10% ($80K‚Äì$85K).

extra.en: Commentary: current Hashrate Ribbons phase indicates potential bullish reversal amid miner capitulation.

text.en:
Mempool (memory pool) ‚Äî queue of all unconfirmed BTC transactions waiting to be included in a block by miners. Each node maintains its mempool and updates it as transactions propagate. Mempool size indicates network load. Sharp increase ‚Üí high activity, higher fees, slower confirmations. Direct impact on BTC price is minimal, but mempool growth often coincides with higher volatility.
As of Jan 1, 2026: mempool moderately low (~1‚Äì2 MB, ~2,000+ transactions), network confirms quickly, low fees. Medium-term: prolonged growth ‚Üí increased activity, potential price increase. Long-term: high mempool ‚Üí sustained network usage, potentially positive BTC price impact.

extra.en: Commentary: Mempool reflects network activity and indirectly signals potential volatility and BTC demand.

text.en:
Difficulty ‚Äî Bitcoin mining difficulty, indicating how hard it is to find the correct hash for a new block. Automatically adjusts ~every 2 weeks to maintain ~10 min block time. Rising hashrate ‚Üí difficulty increases, falling ‚Üí decreases. Difficulty does not directly affect price but reflects miner activity and network health.
As of Jan 2, 2026: difficulty ~148.26T, slight adjustment (~0.99%) expected due to slower block times. Difficulty growth correlates with hashrate and institutional activity. Short-term: difficulty drop may trigger volatility. Medium-term: growth confirms market moves. Long-term: high difficulty = secure network ‚Üí reinforces BTC fundamental expectations.

extra.en: Commentary: Difficulty is a key network health indicator, indirectly confirming stability and participant confidence.
